name: Warna (itch)
description:
Warna is a short puzzle/platformer that was made by 1 person in 7 days for the Design Buddies Game Jam, to fit the theme of "community". 

Change your color and time your movements to collect the three wayward buddies, and unite them at the plaza.

Controls:

Movement: W/A/S/D

Jump: Spacebar

Menu: M

White: 1

Red: 2

Green: 3

Blue: 4
